module.name: ap210_functional_requirement_allocation
module.name.french: Attribution de spécification fonctionnelle pour l'AP 210
module.keywords: module, electrical, functional, requirement allocation, behaviour, network analysis, nodal representation

abstract.p: the representation of functional requirement allocation. Functional Requirement Allocation includes the following information: allocation of customer, regulatory agency, or enterprise requirements to a functional element or to a functional specification for various phases and purposes of a design process. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided.
abstract.li: requirement allocation to a functional unit in a nodal representation.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of functional requirement allocation. Functional Requirement Allocation includes the following information: allocation of customer, regulatory agency, or enterprise requirements to a functional element or to a functional specification for various phases and purposes of a design process. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided.

inscope.li: requirement allocation to a functional unit in a nodal representation;
items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Functional unit requirement allocation, ISO/TS 10303-1680.
